values: 术语；措辞；名称；学期（尤用于英国；学校一年分三个学期）；任期；到期；期限；条件；条款；项目；开庭期；界限；终点
称呼；命名；把…称为；把…叫做；给…取名；表达

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指某种语言、某人或某一知识领域的全部词汇。
指有特定意义的词，词语或术语。
集合名词，指词汇、语汇或词汇量。
普通用词，指语言的最小单位的单词、字，也可指话、整句话或一段话。
普通用词，指国家、民族或种族内部使用，已经系统化的语言。

word_group.brief_definition: 向...屈服；对...让步；与...妥协；和...达成协议
复活节后开始的学期；开庭期

bilingual.source: Carol Dweck is a psychologist and the first person to use the term growth mindset.
bilingual.target: 卡罗尔·德韦克是一位心理学家，第一个使用“成长型思维”这个术语。
我们需要定义这个术语。

bilingual.source: This term is very common in medicine.
bilingual.target: 这个术语在医学中很常见。

bilingual.source: Can you explain the meaning of this term?
bilingual.target: 你能解释一下这个术语的意思吗？

bilingual.source: The term was frequently bandied in the media.
bilingual.target: 这个术语在媒体中经常被讨论。

bilingual.source: Do you know the meaning of this medical term?
bilingual.target: 你知道这个医学术语的意思吗？

bilingual.source: Please add a footnote to explain this term.
bilingual.target: 请添加一个脚注来解释这个术语。

bilingual.source: This term often appears in legal documents.
bilingual.target: 这个术语在法律文件中经常出现。

bilingual.source: This term is frequently used in legal documents.
bilingual.target: 这个术语经常在法律文件中使用。

bilingual.source: Scientists are discussing the definition of this term.
bilingual.target: 科学家们正在讨论这个术语的定义。

list.abstract: term，英文单词，作名词、及物动词，翻译为期限、学期、叫做等。

yingyinNormal.en: It's time to start thinking long term.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是时候想长远一些了。

yingyinNormal.en: Short-term memory loss. I don't believe this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 短期失忆症，我不信这个。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a term that came out of the car industry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这来自于汽车行业。

yingyinNormal.en: Long term memory data selection via channel sober be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过清醒的渠道选择长期记忆数据。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not a term one usually hears in civilized conversation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种话在有教养的对话总是听不到的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Do you really see this as a long-term thing? I don't know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你认为你们可以长久吗？我不知道。

yingyinNormal.en: That makes sense, but me as whip? Yes. A third-term congress woman?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就说得通了，但是让我当党鞭? 没错。一个只有三任任期的女众议员?

yingyinNormal.en: This primitive yeast was unpredictable and gave us the term "barmy".
yingyinNormal.zh: 原始的酵母很难掌握，因此我们有了"发疯"这个词。

yingyinNormal.en: It's the same problem that we have whenever emotion takes over and create a heightened sensitivity in the short term issues and get us forget the long term.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同样的问题会出现，当我们的情绪占上风，使得我们更热衷于将注意力集中在一些短期问题上，而忘记解决一些长期性问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Obesity, the long-term health of our families in the country are at stake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肥胖，在这个国家普遍存在的健康议题，而且已经到了堪称危急的时刻。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

yingyinNormal.en: It was going well until he called us, I believe the term he used was a chick site.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还不错，直到他叫我们，我想他用的名称是小妞网站。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I think it would send a very clear message to ICO. In the short term, yes, but…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想这会给哈里发国发出非常清楚的信号。短期来看没错，但是...

yingyinNormal.en: No, it's not. I know it's not. I'm so sorry. See, I suffer from short-term memory loss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，不是的，我知道那不是玩笑。对不起，看，我有短期失忆症。

yingyinNormal.en: David doesn't know how bad this year will be, but long-term, the prospects aren't good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大卫不知道今年会有多糟糕，但长期来看，情况非常不乐观。

yingyinNormal.en: There were four of us, agents. Not just agents. Polite term. Alex. Gabriel. Me. And Ajay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有四个人，特工。不只是特工。这是委婉用词。阿列克斯，加百列，我，还有阿杰。

yingyinNormal.en: Tara has decided that in the best interest of the fetus, she will carry the baby to term.
yingyinNormal.zh: 塔拉决定了为了胎儿的利益，她会怀着孩子直到生产。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, he would never be that disappointing. He's planned something, something long-term.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，不，他不会那么让人失望的，他肯定计划好了什么，长期计划。

yingyinNormal.en: Francis, this is one way to salvage your first term. Walker was supposed to plead the Fifth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗兰西斯，这是挽救你第一任期的办法。沃克本该拒不解释。

yingyinNormal.en: What if I suggested that you could serve in the leadership this term? To replace me, as whip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我说你这一届就能进入领导层呢？接替我，做党鞭。

yingyinNormal.en: Monster Is a relative term. To a canary, a cat is a monster. We're just used to being the cat.
yingyinNormal.zh: “怪物”是一个相对的词语，对于金丝雀来说 猫就是怪物，我们只不过是习惯把自己当猫罢了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 词语; 术语; 措辞

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 向...屈服；对...让步；与...妥协；和...达成协议

sense_info_list.en: a fixed or limited period for which something lasts or is intended to last

examination_example.sentence: But in the medium <highlight>term</highlight>, middle-class workers may need a lot of help adjusting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但从中期来看，中产阶级工人可能需要很多帮助来调整。

examination_example.sentence: That's because happiness is linked to the kind of longer-<highlight>term</highlight> thinking necessary for making investments for the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是因为幸福与对未来进行投资所必需的那种长期思考有关。

examination_example.sentence: But historically we have spent about 12 percent of our days contemplating the longer <highlight>term</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是纵观历史，我们大约花了12%的时间来思索更长远的事。

sense_info_list.en: a word or phrase used to describe a thing or to express a concept, especially in a particular kind of language or branch of study
sense_info_list.zh: 词语; 术语; 措辞

examination_example.sentence: If you and I parachuted back to Fortune 500 companies in 1990, we would see much less frequent use of <highlight>terms</highlight> like journey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你和我空降回到1990年的财富500强公司，你会发现那时人们使用诸如“旅程”之类的词语并不那么的频繁。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Terms</highlight> like unplug, offline, life-hack, bandwidth, and capacity are all about setting boundaries between the office and the home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像“放下”“离线”“拼生活”“宽带”以及“负荷”等词都用来描述职场与家庭的界限。

examination_example.sentence: It was only after "toddler" became a common shoppers' <highlight>term</highlight> that it evolved into a broadly accepted developmental stage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到“幼童”这个词常常为顾客所用，它才逐渐变成被人们广泛接受的一个成长阶段。

sense_info_list.en: conditions under which an action may be undertaken or agreement reached

examination_example.sentence: More than half of all British scientific research is now published under open access <highlight>terms</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，英国一半以上的科学研究都是在开放获取条款下发表的。

examination_example.sentence: The dearth of moral purpose frames not only the fact of widespread phone hacking but the <highlight>terms</highlight> on which the trial took place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 道德目的的缺失不仅体现在普遍电话窃听的事实，也体现在审判发生所依据的法律条款上。

examination_example.sentence: It is often defined in <highlight>terms</highlight> of body mass index, or BMI.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它通常根据身体质量指数或BMI来定义。

examination_example.sentence: To filter out what is unique from what is shared might enable us to understand what guides it in evolutionary or cognitive <highlight>terms</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将个别因素从共性中剔除，我们或许能够理解，从进化或者认知的方面来看，是何种因素引导了这种行为的发展。

sense_info_list.en: each of the periods in the year
give a descriptive name to; call by a specified name
each of the quantities in a ratio, series, or mathematical expression

word_usage.usage: in terms of表示“在……方面”，后面既可以接sth.也可以接宾语从句what/how/who…
英国的中小学或大学，一学年分为三个学期（用term），美国的大学一年分为两个学期（用semester）或三个学期（用trimester）。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 中期；期中；期中考试

word_family.mean: n. 专门名词；名称；术语；期；期限；任期；学期；开庭期；条件；条款；项

sense_info_list.en: a word or phrase used to describe a thing or to express a concept, especially in a particular kind of language or branch of study

examination_example.sentence: Do away with jargon <highlight>terms</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要使用行话术语。

examination_example.sentence: Explain all the jargon <highlight>terms</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解释所有的术语。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists often use specialized jargon <highlight>terms</highlight> while communicating with laymen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家在与外行交流时经常使用专业术语。

sense_info_list.en: a fixed or limited period for which something lasts or is intended to last

examination_example.sentence: In the short <highlight>term</highlight>, perhaps they are right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从短期来看，也许他们是对的。

examination_example.sentence: That's the challenge that traditional luxury brands will have to contend with in the mid- to long-<highlight>term</highlight> future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是传统奢侈品牌在中长期未来必须应对的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: Maintaining relationships over the long <highlight>term</highlight> takes effort.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想让一段关系长久绝非易事。

sense_info_list.en: a relationship between people

examination_example.sentence: They make it a point to be on good <highlight>terms</highlight> with their employees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们强调要与员工保持良好关系。

examination_example.sentence: When they are on good <highlight>terms</highlight> with their managers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们与经理相处融洽时。

examination_example.sentence: He was the first person to develop it successfully into a global communication system—in both <highlight>terms</highlight> of the word, worldwide and all-inclusive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是第一个成功地将其发展成为全球通讯系统的人，无论是在世界范围内还是在全方位无所不包。

sense_info_list.en: each of the quantities in a ratio, series, or mathematical expression
conditions under which an action may be undertaken or agreement reached
each of the periods in the year

word_usage.usage: 表示“从…的角度”“就…来说”“用…表示”可以用in terms of，terms之前不可加冠词the。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 中期；期中；期中考试

word_family.mean: n. 专门名词；名称；术语；期；期限；任期；学期；开庭期；条件；条款；项

sense_info_list.en: a fixed or limited period for which something lasts or is intended to last

examination_example.sentence: But in the long <highlight>term</highlight> their performance is negatively affected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但从长远来看，他们的表现会受到负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: How do early career setbacks affect our long-<highlight>term</highlight> success?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早期的职业挫折如何影响我们长期成功？

examination_example.sentence: So, these things are not sustainable; they don't make us happy in the long <highlight>term</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，这些都是不可持续的; 长期来看，它们不会让我们快乐。

sense_info_list.en: a word or phrase used to describe a thing or to express a concept; especially in a particular kind of language or branch of study

examination_example.sentence: Global warming is the more accurate <highlight>term</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球变暖是更准确的术语。

examination_example.sentence: Why did NASA choose the <highlight>term</highlight>"climate change"?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国宇航局为什么选择“气候变化”这个术语？

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>term</highlight> kleptoplasty is used to describe the practice of create nutrients from sunlight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 术语“盗食质体”一词是用来描述从阳光中获取营养物质的做法。

examination_example.sentence: I recently tried to estimate this impact in <highlight>terms</highlight> of a most famous food, the burger (汉堡包) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我最近试图用一种最著名的食物来评估这种影响，那就是汉堡。

examination_example.sentence: The Greeks are always concerned about boxing themselves in, in <highlight>terms</highlight> of convictions (信念) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 希腊人总是担心自己在信仰上受到束缚。

examination_example.sentence: This is Aesop, the fabulist (寓言家) , the man of these charming little tales, often told in <highlight>terms</highlight> of animals and animal relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是寓言家伊索，讲述这些迷人小故事的人，经常以动物和动物的关系来讲述。

sense_info_list.en: each of the periods in the year
language used on a particular occasion; a way of expressing oneself

examination_example.sentence: Instead of using words for precise quantities, these people rely exclusively on <highlight>terms</highlight> similar to "a few" or "some."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些人不使用精确的词汇，他们只使用与“少数”或“一些”相似的词汇。

examination_example.sentence: Talk about balance in simpler <highlight>terms</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用更简单的术语谈论平衡。

sense_info_list.en: each of the quantities in a ratio; series; or mathematical expression
a relationship between people
conditions under which an action may be undertaken or agreement reached

word_usage.usage: 表示“从…的角度”“就…来说”“用…表示”可以用in terms of，terms之前不可加冠词the。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 专门名词；名称；术语；期；期限；任期；学期；开庭期；条件；条款；项

examination_example.sentence: The following <highlight>term</highlight>, I registered for an ASL class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下个学期，我注册了一个美国手语班。

examination_example.sentence: I'm glad this is my last <highlight>term</highlight> here, though.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，我很高兴这是我在这里的最后一个学期。

examination_example.sentence: I still have three <highlight>terms</highlight> to go until I'm done.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还有三个学期要完成。

examination_example.sentence: Tech company UneeQ is heading for its “digital humans” , which appear life like on the screen in <highlight>terms</highlight> of language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科技公司UneeQ正朝着它的“数字人类”方向发展，从语言的角度来看，这种“数字人类”在屏幕上看起来栩栩如生。

examination_example.sentence: What if, instead of considering time in <highlight>terms</highlight> of astronomy, we related time to ecology?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们不从天文学的角度来考虑时间，而是将时间与生态学联系起来呢？

examination_example.sentence: It is different from traditional tourism because it allows the traveler to become educated about the areas—in <highlight>terms</highlight> of geographical conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不同于传统的旅游业，因为它可以让旅行者了解当地的地理条件。

examination_example.sentence: The trend, then, was toward the "penny paper"-a <highlight>term</highlight> referring to papers made widely available to the public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当时的趋势是“便士报”——一个术语，指广泛向公众提供的报纸。

examination_example.sentence: Another way of setting realistic goals is to analyze your short and long <highlight>term</highlight> objectives, keeping in mind your beliefs, values and strengths.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种设定现实目标的方法是分析你的短期和长期目标，记住你的信仰，价值观和优势。

examination_example.sentence: Everyone can define time on their own <highlight>terms</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都可以用自己的方式定义时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: each of the periods in the year

examination_example.sentence: I think my failure that <highlight>term</highlight> taught me just as much as my success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想，我那学期的失败和我的成功一样教会了我很多。

examination_example.sentence: It's time to pack (收拾) your school bag and get ready for the new school <highlight>term</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是时候收拾书包，为新学期做好准备了。

examination_example.sentence: At the beginning of this <highlight>term</highlight>, he found that studying English was very difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这学期初，他发现学英语很难。

sense_info_list.en: a fixed or limited period for which something lasts or is intended to last

examination_example.sentence: He is doing research on Chinese solar <highlight>terms</highlight> (节气).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他正在研究中国的节气。

examination_example.sentence: The twenty-four solar <highlight>terms</highlight> have a history of thousands of years in China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 二十四节气在中国有几千年的历史。

examination_example.sentence: This is the first study that shows the association between long-<highlight>term</highlight> exposure to green space and brain structure
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是第一项显示长期接触绿色空间与大脑结构之间联系的研究。

sense_info_list.en: a word or phrase used to describe a thing or to express a concept, especially in a particular kind of language or branch of study

examination_example.sentence: On February 19, the Chinese-English Dictionary of Weiqi <highlight>Terms</highlight> came out in Beijing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2月19日，汉英围棋术语词典在北京出来了。

examination_example.sentence: Even many native English speakers are often confused by the meanings of these <highlight>terms</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 甚至许多以英语为母语的人也经常被这些术语的含义所迷惑。

word_usage.usage: 表示“从…的角度”“就…来说”“用…表示”可以用in terms of，terms之前不可加冠词the。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指语言的最小单位的单词、字，也可指话语、整句话或一段话。
普通用词，指国家、民族或种族内部使用，已经系统化的语言。
指有特定意义的词，词语或术语。
